cn.title: 关于支持 Ethereum（ETH）网络升级和硬分叉的公告

message.data: 由于 Ethereum（ETH）的网络升级和硬分叉，Ethereum（ETH）将于以太坊区块高度12,244,000（预计时间2021年04月15日17:04 HKT）进行的网络升级。
为保障您的资产安全，比特派将于 2021年4月15日17:00（香港时间）暂停 ETH 收发、派银行充提等业务。请您提前做好相关规划。
感谢您对比特派 Bitpie 的支持。

en.title: Bitpie will support Ethereum (ETH) network upgrade and hard fork

message.data: Bitpie will support the upcoming Ethereum (ETH) hard fork & upgrade at the Ethereum block height of 12,244,000(estimated at 09:04 UTC, April 15, 2021).
In order to protect the security of your assets, Bitpie will limit the ETH send and receive function in the APP at 17:00 on 15/04/2021. Please avoid ETH sending and receiving during this period.
The related functions will be restored in the first time after the ETH blockchain is stable .
